text: Phillip Bruns (May 2, 1931 - February 8, 2012) was an American actor and writer who was known for his role as George Shumway in Mary Hartman, Mary Hartman. Bruns was born on May 2, 1931 in Pipestone, Minnesota.Philip Bruns (1931-2012) profile at FilmReference.com He was married to Laurie Franks from until his death in 2012. Bruns died on February 8, 2012 in Los Angeles, California from natural causes, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Phil Bruns; findagrave.com Category:1931 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:Writers from Minnesota
